name: DeleteRecordingAddOnResultPayload
description: Delete a payload from the result along with all associated Data

AccountSid.description: The SID of the [Account](https://www.twilio.com/docs/iam/api/account) that created the Recording AddOnResult Payload resources to delete.

ReferenceSid.description: The SID of the recording to which the AddOnResult resource that contains the payloads to delete belongs.

AddOnResultSid.description: The SID of the AddOnResult to which the payloads to delete belongs.

Sid.description: The Twilio-provided string that uniquely identifies the Recording AddOnResult Payload resource to delete.
